calculate.description: Calculate basic math expressions. To have the bot automatically detect and answer expressions it can solve, change the setting `automath` to "Yes".

embed.title: Evaluation
embed.description:
**Raw input from {author}:**
```{raw}```
**Evaluation of the following input:**
```py
{expression}
= {output}```

params.expression: A simple math expression (algebraic equations will not work). Some mathematical functions are allowed. Values that are too large will throw errors.

calculate.guide: To view the list of available functions, run `{prefix}math_functions`.

usage.{prefix}math_functions: Lists math functions used in this module.

errors.SyntaxError:
A syntax error has occured. More information show below:
{err_info}
errors.NumberTooHigh: The value you want to evaluate is too either too large to be reasonably calculated or too large to display.
errors.ZeroDivisionError: An attempt to divide by zero was made.
errors.GeneralError: An error has occured. No more information can be given.
